Name: PinCOL
About the game: PinCOL is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!! Destroy Enemies, collect Pins and use them to Upgrade Weapons and Ship. Get Experience in Roguelikemode to Unlock new Ships with Special Powers -Main Color Mechanics: The Player Ship can change Color between RED and BLUE, you can be damaged by enemy weapons only if opposite color, same thing with your weapons versus the enemies. -WEAPONS: Bullet, Missile, Laser, Mine, Flak -ITEMS: 8 Special Technology to obtain -Story Mode: A solar system fully explorable, defend Planets by destroying all Enemies spawned from Wormholes to get new Items and unlock the Planet's Base station, Mining Station and Refinery, build Mining Drones to get materials from Asteroids, refining into Pins. Other 3 Alien Stations are the second harder objective. -Roguelike Mode: A mode where you have initially one Ship to select at Start, destroy Waves of Enemies to obtain XP and get Upgrades Cards to improve Weapons and Ship Stats. Unlock New Ships gaining Experience every Run. NOTE: Story Mode: under Development, partially completed. Roguelike Mode: Completed with 5 Zones, planned new Zones and Upgrades in next Updates
